definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: The international community should give ICJ more opportunity to display its justice.
sentences.chinese: 國際社會應該給予國際法院更多表現其公正的機會。

sentences.english: Chapter Four discusses China's attitude towards the optional compulsory jurisdiction of ICJ.
sentences.chinese: 第四章考察了中國與國際法院任意強制管轄權。

sentences.english: The Security Coundcil can ask the Court for an advisory opinion on any legal question.
sentences.chinese: 安理會可以就任何法律問題向國際法院提出諮詢。

sentences.english: The advisory jurisdiction is one of the two jurisdictions of the International Justice Court.
sentences.chinese: 諮詢管轄權是國際法院的兩大管轄權之一。
